            </gmd:citation>
            <gmd:abstract>
                <gco:CharacterString>The Wheatley River Improvement Group (WRIG) is a non-government, not-for-profit organization dedicated to the protection and management of The Wheatley River, Cymbria, Crooked Creek, Chapel Creek, Oyster Bed Bridge, Hornes Creek and Lukes Creek Watersheds. During the summer field season, water quality data is collected weekly through portable water quality sensors. This information is analyzed with historical data to determine water quality status and trends in the watersheds and guide watershed management. Thank you to the PEI Wildlife Conservation Fund, PEI Watershed Management Fund, WRIG Sponsors, and WRIG members for their financial support. An additional thank you to the PEI Watershed Alliance for their technical support and equipment use.</gco:CharacterString>

keywords_translation_method.fr: Keyword text translated using the Amazon translate service / texte traduit à l'aide du service Amazon translate

name: 10-25976-kvqw-tz51
notes: The Wheatley River Improvement Group (WRIG) is a non-government, not-for-profit organization dedicated to the protection and management of The Wheatley River, Cymbria, Crooked Creek, Chapel Creek, Oyster Bed Bridge, Hornes Creek and Lukes Creek Watersheds. During the summer field season, water quality data is collected weekly through portable water quality sensors. This information is analyzed with historical data to determine water quality status and trends in the watersheds and guide watershed management. Thank you to the PEI Wildlife Conservation Fund, PEI Watershed Management Fund, WRIG Sponsors, and WRIG members for their financial support. An additional thank you to the PEI Watershed Alliance for their technical support and equipment use.

notes_translated.en: The Wheatley River Improvement Group (WRIG) is a non-government, not-for-profit organization dedicated to the protection and management of The Wheatley River, Cymbria, Crooked Creek, Chapel Creek, Oyster Bed Bridge, Hornes Creek and Lukes Creek Watersheds. During the summer field season, water quality data is collected weekly through portable water quality sensors. This information is analyzed with historical data to determine water quality status and trends in the watersheds and guide watershed management. Thank you to the PEI Wildlife Conservation Fund, PEI Watershed Management Fund, WRIG Sponsors, and WRIG members for their financial support. An additional thank you to the PEI Watershed Alliance for their technical support and equipment use.
notes_translated.fr: Le Wheatley River Improvement Group (WRIG) est une organisation non gouvernementale à but non lucratif dédiée à la protection et à la gestion des bassins versants de la rivière Wheatley, de Cymbria, de Crooked Creek, de Chapel Creek, d'Oyster Bed Bridge, de Hornes Creek et de Lukes Creek. Pendant la saison estivale sur le terrain, les données sur la qualité de l'eau sont collectées chaque semaine au moyen de capteurs portatifs de qualité de l'eau. Ces informations sont analysées à l'aide de données historiques afin de déterminer l'état de la qualité de l'eau et les tendances dans les bassins versants et d'orienter la gestion des bassins versants. Merci au PEI Wildlife Conservation Fund, au PEI Watershed Management Fund, aux commanditaires du WRIG et aux membres du WRIG pour leur soutien financier. Un autre merci à la PEI Watershed Alliance pour son soutien technique et son utilisation de l'équipement.

notes_translation_method.fr: Description text translated using the Amazon translate service / texte traduit à l'aide du service Amazon translate

description_translated.en: DataStream is an open access platform for sharing water and sediment quality data.
description_translated.fr: DataStream est une plateforme en libre accès pour partager des données sur la qualité de l'eau et des sédiments.

title: Wheatley River Improvement Group - Water Quality Monitoring

title_translated.en: Wheatley River Improvement Group - Water Quality Monitoring
title_translated.fr: Groupe d'amélioration de la rivière Wheatley - Surveillance de la qualité de l'eau
